resources.string:
Maybe read a dictionary so you won't guess on the wrong letter next time 

 By the way, the word was: 
"%1$s"

Congratulations, you won the game by guessing the word: 
"%1$s" 

 With %2$s points you must be a true walking dictionary
You just lost a life from your wrong guess and have %1$s left
Extra turn - You received an additional life
Miss turn - You lost a life and now have %1$s remaining
You Spun: Bankrupt - All your points are gone

1. A hidden word will be randomly picked from a category 

 2. The job is now for you to guess it before you run out of lives 

 3. You start with 5 lives and 0 points 

 4. Before each turn you spin the wheel of four outcomes: 
 Get a life, lose a life, a number of points or losing all your points 

 5. Is it a number you'll now be allowed to guess a letter 

 6. You'll get the number of points for each instance if it's correct, otherwise you'll lose a life 

 7. Once the word is fully visible you win. If, however, you run out of lives before this, you lose 

 Ready?
